2. Review any TODO files (REMY-TODO.md, SKILLS-TODO.md, project-specific TODOs)
3. Identify what each project PM should be working on
4. Generate a brief status report

**Projects to check:**
- Pantry-Pal (what's the next milestone?)
- Remy-Finance (progress on dashboard?)
- Blog/Content (what posts are queued?)
- Any other active ventures

**Post to Discord #status channel:**
- Executive summary of all projects
- Any blockers or items needing thindery's attention
- Next actions for each project

Keep it brief but informative. This runs every hour.
